Lines: 知っての通り、ベルファスト基地は連邦軍の重要拠点の1つだ。
今回はあまり余裕が無いから、準備が出来次第すぐに向かう。
DeepL_mtl: As you know, the Belfast base is one of the most important bases for the federal army.
I don't have much time to spare this time, so I'm heading there as soon as I'm ready.

Lines: ここまでなりふり構わずの行動をとられると、
気の毒にさえ思えるわね。
DeepL_mtl: I even feel sorry for them when they act so impersonally.

Lines: 俺には、地道な情報収集の上で勝機を見出したからこその
行動に思えるがな…。　連邦の前線部隊全体に、浮かれムードが
あるのを見透かしての襲撃だろ？
DeepL_mtl: To me, it seems to me that they are doing what they are doing because they saw a chance to win after diligent information gathering...
You see through the buoyant mood of the entire federal frontline forces, don't you?

Lines: う…。　た、確かにオデッサの勝利で優勢になったからって、
浮かれてる人たち多いよね。
DeepL_mtl: I'm sure there are a lot of people who are buoyed up by the victory in Odessa because they have the upper hand.

Lines: ビンソン計画によって宇宙艦隊の再建が終わり、宇宙への反撃が
開始されたところで、ようやく対等になると思うべきだろうね。
DeepL_mtl: I should think that once the rebuilding of the space fleet is finished by the Vinson Project and the counterattack into space is launched, we will finally be on equal footing.
And the discussion will come later.
